metadata.Title: CVE-2016-3088 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The Fileserver web application in Apache ActiveMQ 5.x before 5.14.0 allows remote attackers to upload and execute arbitrary files via an HTTP PUT followed by an HTTP MOVE request.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2016-3088` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

activemq - 5.14.0+dfsg-1
libactivemq-java - 5.14.0+dfsg-1
No subscription required

notes.Note: tyhicks> Affects "Apache ActiveMQ 5.0.0 - 5.13.2" msalvatore> No upstream patch available for 5.13. Fileserver feature has been completely removed starting with 5.14.0

criterions.comment: activemq package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.14.0+dfsg-1').
